section1.subtitle: About Logistics Company
section1.title: International Logistics Services (ILS) – Reliable Logistics, Seamless Borders

text.part1: At International Logistics Services (ILS), we take pride in providing efficient, secure, and seamless transportation and customs clearance services across multiple global markets.
text.part4: With a strong presence in Azerbaijan, Russia, Kazakhstan, Turkey, China, European countries, the UAE, and Georgia, we ensure that businesses and individuals experience hassle-free logistics solutions tailored to their needs.

item1.title: Rail Freight
item1.text: Sustainable and reliable transport for bulk shipments.

item2.title: Land Freight
item2.text: Reliable road transport solutions for both domestic and international shipments

item3.title: Air Freight
item3.text: Fast and efficient delivery for urgent and high-value cargo.

item4.title: Sea Freight
item4.text: Cost-effective shipping solutions for large-scale and international freight.

Services.subtitle: Our Services
Services.title: Comprehensive Logistics Solutions for a Global Market
Services.text: At International Logistics Services (ILS), we provide a wide range of efficient and secure transportation and customs solutions tailored to meet the diverse needs of businesses and individuals worldwide. With expertise in multiple regions, including Azerbaijan, Russia, Kazakhstan, Turkey, China, European countries, the UAE, and Georgia, we offer customized logistics services to ensure seamless cargo movement across borders.

list.title: Customs Clearance and Documentation

footer.item1: Partner with ILS for Seamless Logistics
footer.item2: At ILS, we go beyond simple freight forwarding—we deliver trust, efficiency, and reliability with every shipment. Whether you're moving cargo across continents or need specialized customs solutions, we are your trusted logistics partner.

list.item1: Accurate and timely completion of customs documentation.
list.item2: Smooth clearance of goods at international borders.
list.item3: Assistance with regulatory compliance and duty payments.
list.item4: Preparation of essential documents such as CMR, Invoice, and Packing List.

item1.title: Request & Quote
item1.text: Submit your shipment details, and we provide a tailored quote.

item2.title: Cargo Pickup
item2.text: We collect your goods from the specified location and prepare for transit.

item3.title: Transportation & Customs
item3.text: Your cargo is transported via land, air, sea, or rail, with customs clearance handled efficiently.

item4.title: Delivery & Confirmation
item4.text: We ensure secure delivery to the final destination with tracking updates.

section1.subtitle: Fastest & Secure Logistics
section1.title: Delivering the Full Range of Logistic Solutions
section1.text: At ILS, we connect businesses with seamless and efficient logistics solutions worldwide. From freight forwarding to customs clearance, our expertise ensures smooth and timely deliveries across industries.

section2.subtitle: Reliable Logistic & Transport Solutions
section2.text: At International Logistics Services (ILS), we deliver a comprehensive range of logistics solutions that cover every aspect of transportation, customs clearance, and supply chain management. From seamless freight forwarding to secure storage and efficient delivery, our team ensures that your goods move smoothly across borders, no matter the destination. We provide tailored services that meet the unique needs of businesses and individuals, offering reliability and peace of mind throughout every step of the journey.

item1.title: Freight Transportation
item1.text: Reliable delivery by land, air, sea, and rail.

item2.title: Custom Brokerage
item2.text: Expert handling of declarations, tariffs, and documentation.

item3.title: Warehousing & Distribution
item3.text: Secure storage and seamless order fulfillment.

item4.title: Specialized Logistics
item4.text: Tailored solutions for oversized, temperature-sensitive, and high-value cargo.

section5.subtitle: What We Achieved!
section5.title: We are logistics improving our skills to fulfill delivery of any level!
section5.desc: At ILS, we are constantly enhancing our skills to handle deliveries of any scale. With improved technology and expertise, we ensure efficient and precise delivery, no matter the complexity.

category2.title: Tracking Number
category2.desc: You can enter up to a maximum of 10 airway bill numbers for tracking

item1.name: Samantha Richards
item1.text: “ As a small business owner, shipping and logistics can be a headache. But ever since we partnered with ILS, everything has been smooth sailing! Their team is incredibly responsive and efficient. Our shipments from China to Azerbaijan always arrive on time, and I love how easy the customs clearance process is. ILS truly offers a hassle-free experience every time. Highly recommend them!

item2.name: Alexey Ivanov
item2.text: “I’ve been working in international trade for over a decade, and I can honestly say that ILS is the best logistics company I’ve ever used. Their services across Russia, Turkey, and the UAE are exceptional. No delays, no hidden fees, and always on top of communication. Whether it's air freight or customs clearance, they handle it all professionally. Truly reliable!

item3.name: Lena Orlov
item3.text: “ I’ve been using ILS for over a year, and they’ve never let me down! Their seamless services from Kazakhstan to European countries are a real game-changer for our business. They handle everything from warehousing to delivery with absolute precision, and their tracking system is fantastic. I’ll definitely continue working with them in the future!

item4.name: Michael Thompson
item4.text: “ ILS has been our go-to logistics partner for shipments from Azerbaijan to Georgia, and their service has been top-notch. They offer transparent pricing, quick delivery, and great customer service. Whenever I have a question, their team is always ready to help. I highly recommend their services for anyone looking for reliable logistics solutions.
